post:
<center>[![](http://i.imgur.com/f83NbwC.png)](https://holderhost.com/)</center>

holderhost was formed in July 2012. If it is quality services you're seeking, then [holderhost LTD](https://holderhost.com) delivers. We are always looking to improve to ensure we offer fast, reliable and affordable hosting for our clients. We utilize OpenVZ and SolusVM as industry standard.

<center>![](http://c.imgs.us/i/e6c03d0.png)</center>

holderhost is a registered company in [New Zealand](http://www.business.govt.nz/companies/app/ui/pages/companies/5130101) owned by Sam Hambling and Plato Puthur.

holderhost offers a **14** day money back guarantee with all VPS plans.

***
<center>![](http://c.imgs.us/i/84a8b1f.png)</center>

**Available Addons**<br>
Additional IPs: $1.5/mo each.<br>
DirectAdmin: $6/mo.
<br>

***

<center>![](http://c.imgs.us/i/d92c193.png)</center>

Virtual servers are provisioned in the PhoenixNAP datacenter in Phoenix, Arizona (United States) and the ColoCrossing datacenter in Buffalo, New York.

<center>![](http://c.imgs.us/i/c2d2e30.png)</center><br>

[**AUP**](http://holderhost.com/clients/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=13) |  [**TOS** ](http://holderhost.com/clients/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=12) | 
[**Privacy Policy** ](http://holderhost.com/clients/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=10)

Quick AUP: IRC, Public Proxies, Public VPNs, Public Torrenting, TOR, Gameservers are not 
allowed. Nothing Illegal in the US (including Spamming). 

We try to be as transparent as possible. Any questions- please feel free to ask!
